channel.title: [Request] How i make item to use one time?
channel.description:
I got ticket, and i want if someone click it you come teleported at somewhere.
Like you use ticket, you come teleported coord 3333,3333 i know how set teleport but im not sure how i start likc "if click pla pla pla"

item.title: [Request] How i make item to use one time?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

yeah its basic.

case 6102: teleportToX = (3091); teleportToY = (3962); heightLevel = 0; deleteItem(6102, getItemSlot(6102), 1); addItem(6103, 1);//Add the new crystal. sendMessage("Your Figmentscape Crystal has died."); break;
